title: Textile, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave. Mordants for 2 reds, purple and black applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied over blue for green. (chintz)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 29.2 x 38.7 cm (11 1/2 x 15 1/4 in.)
description: Curving stems of flowers and bow-tied ribbons. European adaption of a European woven fabric design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave. Mordants for 2 reds, purple and black applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied over blue for green. (chintz). Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-6.
